Indicator Algo Trading

A suite of products covering testing on historical data, execution in the live market, analysis, and algo trading‚Äîavailable on a single platform.

Backtest

Test your strategy on years of data with slippage and brokerage for realistic results.

Learn more

RA Algos

Use strategies by SEBI-registered RAs and automate them with full transparency.

Learn more

Algo Trade

Deploy your strategy live and let it auto-execute trades via your broker account.

Learn more

Forward Test

Run your strategy on live market data without real trades to validate performance.

Learn more

Trading View Signals

Connect TradingView alerts to trigger and automate trades in real time.

Learn more

ChartInk Signals

Auto-execute trades using alerts from Chartink scanners via webhooks.

Learn more

Strategy Builder

Build trading strategies without code. Use indicators and logic blocks easily.

Learn more

Simulator

Simulate trading outcomes based on market moves, bet size, and risk over time.

Simple, Fast, & Free Templates
you can use everyday

Get started with just a click.

for FREE

Backtest on over 5 years of historical data. Super Fast.

with a single click

Save your strategies for simple and fast execution.

Retail Traders ‚ù§Ô∏è AlgoTest

AlgoTest is, hands down, the best algo trading platform in India today. Initially considered calling it "one of the best," but my experience has convinced me otherwise
‚Äî it's simply the best
If one is looking for a platform that truly understands how option trader trades, AlgoTest is the one. Separating signal from strategy is a design beauty.

Dhiraj Sinha

Founder and Managing Partner - Quantum Wealth Management LLP

Currently it is best platform for algo traders.
Charges are very low as compared to other platforms. Main thing is execution is good. Have been using since 1 year. Only minus point is currently they don't support commodity. Hope so that will come soon.

Sahil Kumar

AlgoTest User

I've been collaborating with Raghav Malik for a while now, and I genuinely believe that for any serious trader or investor, automation has become essential.
The days of manually punching in orders are long behind us. As a systematic/quant-based research analyst,
I find AlgoTest to be one of the
most robust and versatile platforms available in the market.

Sandeep Rao

SEBI Registered Research Analyst

One of the big differentiator between HFT and non-HFT first is the tools and technology used by HFT.
Thanks for one step towards democratising this.

Vivek Gadodia

Founder - RBT Algo Systems

Big shout out to AlgoTest for creating an amazing platform,
backtest and go live with any strategy seamlessly with a click of a button.

Theoptionseller (GG)

Founder - MoneyPlant Wealth Management

India's no 1 algo trading platform.
Trade execution is smooth. AlgoTest support team is very good. Interface is very seamless and smooth.. one more thing charges are very low..üòçüòçüòç

Nav G

AlgoTest User

Hats off to @AlgoTest_in for powering Indian options traders with a no-code algo-trading ecosystem that bridges the gap with institutional-grade‚Äîand high-frequency‚Äîtools.
From backtesting to live execution, your technology is democratizing advanced trading. Kudos!

Manish Malhotra

17 + Years Experience | Managing 100 + Algo Traders
